welcome_message: Hello! I'm Andes, your AI running coach. I'm here to help you track your workouts and reach your goals. How can I help you today?
workout_logged: Great job! I've logged your workout: {{distance}} in {{time}}. Keep up the great work!
ask_for_feedback: How did that run feel? (e.g., easy, moderate, hard)
error_message: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please rephrase?
